questiontext.text: In a study of the effect of education on anxiety in patients facing unpleasant surgery, 10 men who received standard education afterward anxiety was measured via a VAS score, as well as in 6 men after comprehensive education._______________________ Standard: n = 10, mean = 35.10, standard deviation = 29.39. Expanded: n = 6, mean = 27.17, standard deviation = 24.32. The test for equality of population variances has the value of the test magnitude and conclusion

answer.text: 1.21, do not reject the null hypothesis.

feedback.text: 1.21, do not reject the null hypothesis…: Incorrect

answer.text: 1.46, do not reject the null hypothesis.

feedback.text: 1.46, do not reject the null hypothesis: Incorrect

answer.text: 0.68, do not reject the null hypothesis.

feedback.text: 0.68, do not reject the null hypothesis…: Correct
